description: Sets the body of a Map Message.

properties.name: names
properties.label: Names
properties.description: Provide the names (keys) of the map message body that should be set to a value.

properties.name: types
properties.label: Types
properties.description: Provide the corresponding types of the properties. Possible types are 'boolean', 'string', 'integer', 'long', 'double', 'float'

properties.name: values
properties.label: Values
properties.description: Provide the corresponding values to set. Either enter a static value or use {propertyname} to use a property value of the referenced message or use {{flowparameter}} to set a flow parameter value. To set the current time in milliseconds, use [time].
